betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The stats of a crop will no longer apply a debuff to its growth speed, making things like resilience actually worth investing into (along with the list of highly practical benefits it now provides).

Nutrients, Humidity and Air Quality have been removed in favour of a singular “nutrient points” value.
10 points can be gained from having water in your crop sticks
10 points can be gained from having fertilizer in your crop sticks.
2 points can be gained from allowing the crop to see the sky.
        Crops in the new crop multi will always have this bonus.
28 points can be gained from preferred biome tags
         If no preferred biome tags are found, a high humidity can instead give up to 14 points.
5 points are added on top to prevent players from being unable to grow anything literally before they can start watering their crops.
